text: Nicolas Daragon (born 12 March 1972) is the Mayor of Valence.Nicolas Daragon, nouveau président de Rhône-Alpes Tourisme He graduated from HEC Paris.Nicolas Daragon vice-président au tourisme He is also vice-president of the Auvergne- Rhône-Alpes regional council.Le Président et l’exécutif == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Nicolas Daragon
